project_details: This a latest tech posting website. In this website users can post new tech products and affiliate link. Modaretor can review post , admin can see site statisitics. Anyone can buy productsand give review of them.
technology: React, Node.js, MongoDB, Html , Tailwind , Firebase
features: Responsive,Login with Email & Password,Social Login(Google),Database(mongodb),User Friendly,Meterial UI Used(learning process)(basic),Payment System (stripe)

project_details: This a hotel management website. This website is for hotel owners. Here hotel owners can show what type of rooms are available and how many rooms are available. User can see room details and can book room of their choice on the available date. After booking they can also post reviews of the room. In total , this is a full hotel website
technology: React, Node.js, MongoDB, Html , Tailwind , Firebase
features: Responsive,Login with Email & Password ,Social Login(Google) ,Database(mongodb) ,User Friendly
